name: Novotel Freiburg

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Novotel in Freiburg is a very good hotel in a good location.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: parking is available at a cost with nice clean rooms and a nice restaurant and bar.
reviews.title: Better than the average Novotel, convenient location

likes.liked: — Convenient location, late buffet breakfast on the Sunday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Novotel in Freiburg for a weekend in December 2007. As usual, our choice of hotel was restricted to where we could get a family room for 2 adults and 2 children, so as is often the case, we chose the Novotel, which was very good value as we booked an early booking offer on the internet.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, not much character

reviews.text: We found this Novotel to be a better standard compared to other Novotels we have stayed in before. The room was large and well furnished and the breakfast buffet was also more extensive, with the bonus of being available until lunch time on the Sunday for a leisurely start to the day.
reviews.title: Lack of Security

reviews.text: Location wise, the hotel is a few minutes walk from the town centre and directly opposite the railway station.
reviews.title: Beautiful, convenient, very courteous employees

likes.disliked: — The stinky pool had a corosive amount of chlorine.

reviews.title: Great Hotel!
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Dorint for 7 nights, and I could have stayed longer! It was very convenient to the train station, and across from the tram. It's centrally located close to shops and restaurants - we walked everywhere. Just a couple blocks from the Munster and other attractions, which was amazing. A restaurant, bar, and snack area are available, as well as a great spa (some things for additional cost). Although it doesn't have the German architecture like some other hotels, the modern atmosphere was very welcoming, and the staff was superb. We will definitely stay at the Dorint again.
This hotel is conveniently located next to the Konzerthaus and the Freiburg main rail station. The walk to the old town is about 10-15 minutes.
reviews.title: Convenient location to rail station; not much charm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean, although nothing special. The hotel lacks the charm of the hotels I saw in the old town, but that's probably to be expected for a chain.
reviews.title: Excellent service

likes.liked: — Cleanliness, service and food were very good.
likes.disliked: — Originally asked for a quiet non-smoking room, but got the opposite. However, it was changed without any problem.

reviews.title: Ok, but nothing special
reviews.text: They have a computer near the front desk that is free to use and has internet access and a printer. A parking garage is available for 13 EUR per night.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If visiting Freiburg again, I would probably look to stay somewhere in the old town.
reviews.title: Okay , but...

reviews.text: A lovely hotel. Everything was lovely and clean and the service was excellent. We had room service and stayed for breakfast which was a bit pricey but was very nice - excellent choice and very fresh. The spa area was quite basic, but very clean and towels readily available - no drinking water though - so take your own down with you. Perfectly situated near the town centre. Only a few minutes walk to nice cafe's and restaurants, although the hotel has a lovely cafe and restaurant itself, so if you don´t want to leave the hotel you don´t have to! We had a lovely stay in this hotel and would recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: good location

aka: Novotel Freiburg Hotel Freiburg Im Breisgau
description: The Novotel Freiburg Am Konzerthaus is located in the heart of the university town of Freiburg. With 219 rooms, a terrace, eight meeting rooms and direct access to the Konzerthaus convention centre, this 4 star hotel is perfect for relaxing or concentrating on work. Unwind with our swimming pool, sauna and beauty treatments. Business travellers and holidaymakers appreciate our central location, opposite the ICE train station, 60 km from Basel International Airport with an easy connection to the A5.
